title: Fragrant ginger and carrot rice
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) basmati rice', '450ml (16 fl oz) water', '30g (1 oz) roasted peanuts', '30g (1 oz) butter', '1 onion, sliced', '1 knob root ginger, minced', '2 to 3 carrots, grated', 'salt to taste', 'cayenne pepper to taste', 'chopped fresh coriander to garnish']
